app_data.signup_prompt: Don't have an account? Sign up now!
app_data.logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?

error_messages.network_error: Network error, please try again later.
error_messages.login_failed: Login failed, please check your credentials.
error_messages.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred, please try again.

success_messages.logout_success: You have been logged out successfully.

dumbbell_bench_press.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie back on a flat bench holding a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip, elbows bent at 90 degrees.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended, keeping them in line with your chest. Exhale during the pressing movement.
Pause at the top and then slowly lower the weights back down to the starting position. Inhale as you lower.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

cable_one_arm_row.name: Cable One Arm Row
instructions: Stand facing a low pulley cable machine with a D-handle attached.
Grab the handle with one hand, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent.
Pull the handle towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blade at the peak of the movement. Exhale as you pull.
Slowly return to the starting position with control. Inhale as you release.
Repeat for reps, then switch arms.

overhead_dumbbell_press.name: Overhead Dumbbell Press
instructions: Sit or stand with a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended overhead. Exhale as you push up.
Pause briefly at the top, then lower the weights back to the starting position. Inhale during the descent.
Maintain a tight core and avoid arching your back.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

lat_pull_down.name: Lat Pull Down
instructions: Sit down at a lat pull-down machine and grab the bar with a wide grip, palms facing forward.
Pull the bar down towards your upper chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Exhale as you pull.
Hold for a second at the bottom of the movement.
Slowly return the bar to the starting position with control. Inhale as you return.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

ez_bar_barbell_curl.name: EZ Bar Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand upright holding an EZ bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Curl the bar up toward your chest while keeping your elbows close to your torso. Exhale while lifting.
Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement.
Lower the bar slowly back to the starting position. Inhale during the lowering phase.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

hanging_leg_raises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and legs straight.
Engage your core and raise your legs up until they are parallel to the ground or higher. Exhale as you raise your legs.
Pause briefly at the top position.
Lower your legs back down slowly and under control. Inhale as you lower.
Repeat for reps, avoiding swinging or using momentum.

barbell_squat.name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell resting across your upper back.
Brace your core, bend your knees, and lower your body into a squat. Inhale as you descend.
Go as low as comfortable while keeping your back straight and knees in line with your toes.
Push through your heels to return to standing. Exhale as you rise.
Repeat for reps.

leg_extension.name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit on a leg extension machine and place your feet behind the padded bar.
Extend your legs fully while keeping your back flat against the seat. Exhale during the lift.
Pause at the top to contract your quads.
Slowly lower the weight back down. Inhale as you lower.
Repeat for reps.

leg_curl.name: Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down on a leg curl machine with your ankles under the roller pad.
Curl your legs upward as far as possible. Exhale as you lift.
Hold briefly at the top and squeeze your hamstrings.
Lower your legs slowly back to the starting position. Inhale as you return.
Repeat for reps.

calf_raises.name: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand on the edge of a step with your heels hanging off.
Raise your heels as high as possible by contracting your calves. Exhale as you lift.
Pause briefly at the top.
Lower your heels below the step slowly. Inhale as you descend.
Repeat for reps.

cable_lateral_raise.name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand next to a low cable pulley with the handle in the hand farthest from the machine.
Raise your arm out to the side until shoulder height. Exhale as you lift.
Pause briefly, keeping your arm straight.
Lower back to the starting position with control. Inhale as you lower.
Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

dumbbell_shrugs.name: Dumbbell Shrugs
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with arms at your sides.
Lift your shoulders as high as possible toward your ears. Exhale as you shrug.
Pause at the top to contract your traps.
Lower the dumbbells slowly. Inhale as you return.
Repeat for reps.

barbell_incline_bench_press.name: Barbell Incline Bench Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench and grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the bar to your upper chest. Inhale during the descent.
Press the bar back up until your arms are extended. Exhale as you press.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.

barbell_row.name: Barbell Row
instructions: Bend forward at the hips with a barbell in hand, back straight, knees slightly bent.
Pull the bar toward your lower ribcage. Exhale as you row.
Pause briefly and squeeze your back.
Lower the bar slowly. Inhale as you lower.
Repeat for reps.

cable_cross_over_lower.name: Cable Cross Over (Lower)
instructions: Stand between two low cable pulleys and grab the handles.
Step forward with one foot and slightly bend your elbows.
Bring the handles upward in front of your chest. Exhale as you lift.
Squeeze your chest at the top, then slowly return. Inhale during the return.
Repeat for reps.

skull_crusher.name: Skull Crusher
instructions: Lie on a flat bench holding an EZ bar with arms extended above your chest.
Lower the bar by bending your elbows until it's near your forehead. Inhale as you lower.
Extend your arms to return to the start. Exhale as you push up.
Repeat for reps, keeping elbows fixed in place.

ab_crunch.name: Ab Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and hands at the sides of your head.
Contract your abs and lift your shoulders off the floor. Exhale as you crunch.
Pause briefly at the top.
Lower back down slowly. Inhale as you return.
Repeat for reps.

leg_press.name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in the leg press machine with feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Lower the platform by bending your knees. Inhale as you lower.
Press the weight back up without locking your knees. Exhale as you push.
Repeat for reps.

cable_face_pull.name: Cable Face Pull
instructions: Attach a rope to a high pulley and grip both ends.
Pull the rope toward your face, elbows flaring out. Exhale as you pull.
Pause and squeeze your upper back and rear delts.
Return to start slowly. Inhale as you return.
Repeat for reps.

dumbbell_lateral_raise.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Raise your arms out to the sides until shoulder level. Exhale as you lift.
Pause briefly, keeping elbows slightly bent.
Lower the dumbbells slowly. Inhale as you lower.
Repeat for reps.
